creator: Freecharge
descriptionHtml:
Now you can do a lot more on Freecharge. Recharge your mobile, pay bills, send and receive money through UPI, create BHIM UPI ID & link bank account for instant money transfer, invest in Mutual Funds, make investments with SIPs, buy Deals from your favourite brands starting at ₹1, pay with Freecharge across categories like movies, entertainment, food, shopping, travel and get cashbacks and discounts. Get Gift Cards, Personal Loans, Debit Card EMI, Digital Credit Card and much more.

What we have in store for you:

• Mutual Fund: The all new Mutual Fund on Freecharge is BIGGER, BETTER, SMARTER. It’s power-packed with features that let you make intelligent investment decisions. With top fund houses like Reliance, Axis, Aditya Birla, DSP, Motilal Oswal, ICICI Prudential and more on board, now you can choose your most preferred funds and start investing in just 2 minutes. What’s more! It’s 100% paperless, you can start investing with just ₹100 with top-rated funds to choose from (ratings by Value Research)

• UPI Payments: With Freecharge UPI powered by Axis Bank, you can now set up your ‘@freecharge’ UPI ID with all your existing bank accounts. You can send money by entering the recipient’s UPI ID or bank account + IFSC code, request money, pay at online & offline brands, scan & pay or request money through UPI enabled QR codes. You can also conveniently pay for recharges and bills using your UPI handle.

• Mobile Recharges: Prepaid recharges and post-paid bill payments available for all leading Indian telecom providers like Airtel, Vodafone, Idea, Reliance Jio & others with exciting cashback offers.

• Bill Payments: Pay your electricity, DTH, data card, landline, broadband and gas bills all under one roof.

• Metro Card Recharges: Top up your Mumbai Metro smart card easily with Freecharge.

• Google Play Recharges: Get Google Play recharge codes on Freecharge.

• Cashless Payments: With Freecharge, you can book movie tickets, order from restaurants, book trains, flight tickets, do hotel bookings and shop your heart out. Pay cashless at more than 1 lack of your favourite websites and stores.

• QR Code Feature: With this feature on Freecharge, you have the convenience of just scanning a QR code instead of adding a phone number for transacting.

• Deals: Deals on Freecharge allows you to buy amazing discount coupons from your favourite brands starting at just ₹1.

• Cashbacks and Discounts: Get amazing discounts and cashbacks when you transact using Freecharge

• Transaction history & Help Center: Access all your recent transactions in the ‘Transactions’ section on the Freecharge app. Also, to raise queries regarding any particular transaction, you can use the Help Center feature.


App permissions and reasons:
SMS - This is required to auto-read your OTP’s and register for UPI
Location - This is for our Nearby feature to find the closest stores around you
Contacts - We use this to better identify the phone numbers you are recharging.
Camera - We use this to scan QR codes
Accounts - This is used to pre-populate email id while signing up
Call - This is used to detect which sim you wish to register your UPI handle with


You can contact our customer support team by writing to us at apps@freecharge.com for any suggestions, queries or comments.
For more interesting updates, visit https://blog.freecharge.in
descriptionShort: Recharge, Bill Payments, Payment App, Mutual Funds, SIP, UPI, Insurance Payment

container.value:
Freecharge Payment Technologies Pvt Ltd
16th Floor, Tower C, DLF Cyber Greens, DLF Cyber City, DLF Phase 3, Gurugram, Haryana 122022

creator: Freecharge
descriptionHtml:
Now you can do a lot more on Freecharge. Recharge your mobile, pay bills, pay insurance premiums, transfer money through UPI, create BHIM UPI ID & link bank account for instant money transfer. You can also invest in Mutual Funds (through SIPS or lump sum), Digital Gold, Express FD; buy Deals from different brands; pay with Freecharge for movies, entertainment, food, shopping, and get cashback & discounts. Get Gift Cards, Personal Loans, Debit Card EMI, Digital Gold, Credit Card & much more

What we have in store for you

• Mutual Fund: The all-new Mutual Fund on Freecharge is better than ever. It’s power-packed with features that let you make intelligent investment decisions. Choose your most preferred funds from top fund houses like Reliance, Axis, Aditya Birla, DSP, Motilal Oswal, ICICI Prudential & more. Start investing in just 2 minutes. It’s 100% paperless. You can start with just ₹500. Choose from top-rated funds (ratings by Value Research)

• Loans: From Personal Loans to Gold Loans get loans quickly on Freecharge. Minimal documentation, no hassle

• Gold: Now buy Digital Gold online through Freecharge. It's 24K, 99.5% pure. Online gold means no bank locker needed. No hassle of storage or security. Also, you get to buy gold and sell it in minutes. Digital Gold on Freecharge is secured by SafeGold in partnership with Brink’s and IDBI Security Trustees. Redeem Digital Gold for jewellery/coins from partner jewellers at any time. The gold value has always appreciated. Buy gold as an investment and reap higher returns in the long run. You can buy online gold at real-time market value. Start buying gold online on Freecharge

• Express FD: Open a Fixed Deposit in just 3 minutes via Freecharge, powered by Axis Bank. You just need a deposit of ₹5000 to start your Express FD investment. You don’t need an Axis Banking Savings Account to open a Fixed Deposit. There is no penalty for premature withdrawal of Fixed Deposit of up to 25%. So you can take money from your deposit in case of an emergency. Details required to open an Express FD is your PAN and Aadhaar. No bank visit needed to book your Fixed Deposit. Fixed Deposit is a safe investment since it is unaffected by market fluctuations.

• UPI Payments: With Freecharge UPI powered by Axis Bank, you can set up your ‘@freecharge’ UPI ID for all your existing bank accounts. You can send money, request money, pay at online & offline brands, scan & pay, or request money through UPI enabled QR codes

• Mobile Recharges: Prepaid recharges & post-paid bill payments available for all leading Indian telecom providers like Airtel, Vodafone, Idea, Reliance Jio & others with exciting cashback offers

• Bill Payments: Pay your electricity bill. Pay DTH, data card, landline bill, broadband, water & gas bills, and even pay insurance premium through Freecharge

• Google Play Recharges: Get Google Play recharge codes on Freecharge and enjoy offers & discounts

• QR Code Feature: Now you have the convenience of just scanning a QR code instead of adding a phone number for transacting

• Deals: Deals on Freecharge allows you to buy amazing discount coupons, Freecharge cashback & more from your favourite brands

• Cashbacks and Discounts: Get amazing discounts & cashback when you transact using Freecharge


App permissions and reasons:
Call - Used for enhancing the security of your account and for UPI registration
SMS (optional) - Helps us speed up your transaction by auto-filling OTP and provide personalised financial services
Location (optional) - Helps find the closest stores & deals around you
Contacts (optional) - Get mobile numbers from your contacts
Camera (optional) - Used for scanning QR codes


You can contact our customer support team by writing to us at care@freecharge.com for any suggestions, queries, or comments.
For more interesting updates, visit https://blog.freecharge.in

title: Freecharge - Recharges & Bills, Mutual Funds, UPI

container.value:
Freecharge Payment Technologies Pvt Ltd
16th Floor, Tower C, DLF Cyber Greens, DLF Cyber City, DLF Phase 3, Gurugram, Haryana 122022

creator: Freecharge
descriptionHtml:
Now you can do a lot more on Freecharge. Recharge your mobile, pay bills, pay insurance premiums, transfer money through UPI, create BHIM UPI ID & link bank account for instant money transfer. You can also invest in Mutual Funds (through SIPS or lump sum), Digital Gold, Express FD; buy Deals from different brands; pay with Freecharge for movies, entertainment, food, shopping, and get cashback & discounts. Get Gift Cards, Personal Loans, Debit Card EMI, Digital Gold, Credit Card & much more

What we have in store for you

• Mutual Fund: The all-new Mutual Fund on Freecharge is better than ever. It’s power-packed with features that let you make intelligent investment decisions. Choose your most preferred funds from top fund houses like Reliance, Axis, Aditya Birla, DSP, Motilal Oswal, ICICI Prudential & more. Start investing in just 2 minutes. It’s 100% paperless. You can start with just ₹500. Choose from top-rated funds (ratings by Value Research)

• Loans: From Personal Loans to Gold Loans get loans quickly on Freecharge. Minimal documentation, no hassle

• Gold: Now buy Digital Gold online through Freecharge. It's 24K, 99.5% pure. Online gold means no bank locker needed. No hassle of storage or security. Also, you get to buy gold and sell it in minutes. Digital Gold on Freecharge is secured by SafeGold in partnership with Brink’s and IDBI Security Trustees. Redeem Digital Gold for jewellery/coins from partner jewellers at any time. The gold value has always appreciated. Buy gold as an investment and reap higher returns in the long run. You can buy online gold at real-time market value. Start buying gold online on Freecharge

• Express FD: Open a Fixed Deposit in just 3 minutes via Freecharge, powered by Axis Bank. You just need a deposit of ₹5000 to start your Express FD investment. You don’t need an Axis Banking Savings Account to open a Fixed Deposit. There is no penalty for premature withdrawal of Fixed Deposit of up to 25%. So you can take money from your deposit in case of an emergency. Details required to open an Express FD is your PAN and Aadhaar. No bank visit needed to book your Fixed Deposit. Fixed Deposit is a safe investment since it is unaffected by market fluctuations.

• UPI Payments: With Freecharge UPI powered by Axis Bank, you can set up your ‘@freecharge’ UPI ID for all your existing bank accounts. You can send money, request money, pay at online & offline brands, scan & pay, or request money through UPI enabled QR codes

• Mobile Recharges: Prepaid recharges & post-paid bill payments available for all leading Indian telecom providers like Airtel, Vodafone, Idea, Reliance Jio & others with exciting cashback offers

• Bill Payments: Pay your electricity bill. Pay DTH, data card, landline bill, broadband, water & gas bills, and even pay insurance premium through Freecharge

• Google Play Recharges: Get Google Play recharge codes on Freecharge and enjoy offers & discounts

• QR Code Feature: Now you have the convenience of just scanning a QR code instead of adding a phone number for transacting

• Deals: Deals on Freecharge allows you to buy amazing discount coupons, Freecharge cashback & more from your favourite brands

• Cashbacks and Discounts: Get amazing discounts & cashback when you transact using Freecharge


App permissions and reasons:
Call - Used for enhancing the security of your account and for UPI registration
SMS (optional) - Helps us speed up your transaction by auto-filling OTP and provide personalised financial services
Location (optional) - Helps find the closest stores & deals around you
Contacts (optional) - Get mobile numbers from your contacts
Camera (optional) - Used for scanning QR codes


You can contact our customer support team by writing to us at care@freecharge.com for any suggestions, queries, or comments.
For more interesting updates, visit https://blog.freecharge.in

Freecharge Payment Technologies Pvt Ltd
16th Floor, Tower C, DLF Cyber Greens, DLF Cyber City, DLF Phase 3, Gurugram, Haryana 122022

creator: Freecharge
descriptionHtml:
Now you can do a lot more on Freecharge. Recharge your mobile, pay bills, pay insurance premiums, transfer money through UPI, create BHIM UPI ID & link bank account for instant money transfer. You can also invest in Mutual Funds (through SIPS or lump sum), Digital Gold, Express FD; buy Deals from different brands; pay with Freecharge for movies, entertainment, food, shopping, and get cashback & discounts. Get Gift Cards, Personal Loans, Debit Card EMI, Digital Gold, Credit Card & much more

What we have in store for you

• Mutual Fund: The all-new Mutual Fund on Freecharge is better than ever. It’s power-packed with features that let you make intelligent investment decisions. Choose your most preferred funds from top fund houses like Reliance, Axis, Aditya Birla, DSP, Motilal Oswal, ICICI Prudential & more. Start investing in just 2 minutes. It’s 100% paperless. You can start with just ₹500. Choose from top-rated funds (ratings by Value Research)

• Loans: From Personal Loans to Gold Loans get loans quickly on Freecharge. Minimal documentation, no hassle

• Gold: Now buy Digital Gold online through Freecharge. It's 24K, 99.5% pure. Online gold means no bank locker needed. No hassle of storage or security. Also, you get to buy gold and sell it in minutes. Digital Gold on Freecharge is secured by SafeGold in partnership with Brink’s and IDBI Security Trustees. Redeem Digital Gold for jewellery/coins from partner jewellers at any time. The gold value has always appreciated. Buy gold as an investment and reap higher returns in the long run. You can buy online gold at real-time market value. Start buying gold online on Freecharge

• Express FD: Open a Fixed Deposit in just 3 minutes via Freecharge, powered by Axis Bank. You just need a deposit of ₹5000 to start your Express FD investment. You don’t need an Axis Banking Savings Account to open a Fixed Deposit. There is no penalty for premature withdrawal of Fixed Deposit of up to 25%. So you can take money from your deposit in case of an emergency. Details required to open an Express FD is your PAN and Aadhaar. No bank visit needed to book your Fixed Deposit. Fixed Deposit is a safe investment since it is unaffected by market fluctuations.

• UPI Payments: With Freecharge UPI powered by Axis Bank, you can set up your ‘@freecharge’ UPI ID for all your existing bank accounts. You can send money, request money, pay at online & offline brands, scan & pay, or request money through UPI enabled QR codes

• Mobile Recharges: Prepaid recharges & post-paid bill payments available for all leading Indian telecom providers like Airtel, Vodafone, Idea, Reliance Jio & others with exciting cashback offers

• Bill Payments: Pay your electricity bill. Pay DTH, data card, landline bill, broadband, water & gas bills, and even pay insurance premium through Freecharge

• Google Play Recharges: Get Google Play recharge codes on Freecharge and enjoy offers & discounts

• QR Code Feature: Now you have the convenience of just scanning a QR code instead of adding a phone number for transacting

• Deals: Deals on Freecharge allows you to buy amazing discount coupons, Freecharge cashback & more from your favourite brands

• Cashbacks and Discounts: Get amazing discounts & cashback when you transact using Freecharge


App permissions and reasons:
Call - Used for enhancing the security of your account and for UPI registration
SMS (optional) - Helps us speed up your transaction by auto-filling OTP and provide personalised financial services
Location (optional) - Helps find the closest stores & deals around you
Contacts (optional) - Get mobile numbers from your contacts
Camera (optional) - Used for scanning QR codes


You can contact our customer support team by writing to us at care@freecharge.com for any suggestions, queries, or comments.
For more interesting updates, visit https://blog.freecharge.in

You can also invest in Mutual Funds (through SIPS or lump sum), Digital Gold, Express FD; buy Deals from different brands; pay with Freecharge for movies, entertainment, food, shopping, and get cashback & discounts. Get Gift Cards, Personal Loans, Debit Card EMI, Digital Gold, Credit Card & much more

What we have in store for you

• Mutual Fund: The all-new Mutual Fund on Freecharge is better than ever. It’s power-packed with features that let you make intelligent investment decisions. Choose your most preferred funds from top fund houses like Reliance, Axis, Aditya Birla, DSP, Motilal Oswal, ICICI Prudential & more. Start investing in just 2 minutes. It’s 100% paperless. You can start with just ₹500. Choose from top-rated funds (ratings by Value Research)

• Loans: From Personal Loans to Gold Loans get loans quickly on Freecharge. Minimal documentation, no hassle

• Gold: Now buy Digital Gold online through Freecharge. It's 24K, 99.5% pure. Online gold means no bank locker needed. No hassle of storage or security. Also, you get to buy gold and sell it in minutes. Digital Gold on Freecharge is secured by SafeGold in partnership with Brink’s and IDBI Security Trustees. Redeem Digital Gold for jewellery/coins from partner jewellers at any time. The gold value has always appreciated. Buy gold as an investment and reap higher returns in the long run. You can buy online gold at real-time market value. Start buying gold online on Freecharge

• Express FD: Open a Fixed Deposit in just 3 minutes via Freecharge, powered by Axis Bank. You just need a deposit of ₹5000 to start your Express FD investment. You don’t need an Axis Banking Savings Account to open a Fixed Deposit. There is no penalty for premature withdrawal of Fixed Deposit of up to 25%. So you can take money from your deposit in case of an emergency. Details required to open an Express FD is your PAN and Aadhaar. No bank visit needed to book your Fixed Deposit. Fixed Deposit is a safe investment since it is unaffected by market fluctuations.

• UPI Payments: With Freecharge UPI powered by Axis Bank, you can set up your ‘@freecharge’ UPI ID for all your existing bank accounts. You can send money, request money, pay at online & offline brands, scan & pay, or request money through UPI enabled QR codes

• Mobile Recharges: Prepaid recharges & post-paid bill payments available for all leading Indian telecom providers like Airtel, Vodafone, Idea, Reliance Jio & others with exciting cashback offers

• Bill Payments: Pay your electricity bill. Pay DTH, data card, landline bill, broadband, water & gas bills, and even pay insurance premium through Freecharge

• Google Play Recharges: Get Google Play recharge codes on Freecharge and enjoy offers & discounts

• QR Code Feature: Now you have the convenience of just scanning a QR code instead of adding a phone number for transacting

• Deals: Deals on Freecharge allows you to buy amazing discount coupons, Freecharge cashback & more from your favourite brands

• Cashbacks and Discounts: Get amazing discounts & cashback when you transact using Freecharge


App permissions and reasons:
Call - Used for enhancing the security of your account and for UPI registration
SMS (optional) - Helps us speed up your transaction by auto-filling OTP and provide personalised financial services
Location (optional) - Helps find the closest stores & deals around you
Contacts (optional) - Get mobile numbers from your contacts
Camera (optional) - Used for scanning QR codes


You can contact our customer support team by writing to us at care@freecharge.com for any suggestions, queries, or comments.
For more interesting updates, visit https://blog.freecharge.in

• Mutual Fund: Power-packed with features that help you make intelligent investment decisions. Choose top-rated funds (ratings by Value Research) from top AMCs like HDFC, Axis, ICICI, and more. Start investing in just 2 minutes with a min amount of ₹500. 100% paperless process.

• Gold: Buy Digital Gold online through Freecharge. No hassle of storage or security. Buy at real-time market value & sell later to get high returns. It’s 24K, 99.5% pure.

• Express FD: Powered by Axis Bank. Start your Express FD investment in just 3 minutes by depositing a min amount of Rs.5,000. No Axis Bank Savings Account required. And there is no penalty on premature withdrawal of up to 25% of the Fixed Deposit.

• Financial Strength Score: Have a financial goal in mind? Get to know how your financial habits align with it. Simply provide your expenses & income to see your score and get suggestions on how to improve.

• Google Play Recharges: Get Google Play recharge codes on Freecharge and enjoy offers & discounts.

App permissions and reasons:
Phone - Used for enhancing the security of your account and for UPI registration
SMS (optional) - Helps us speed up your transaction by auto-filling OTP and provide personalized financial services
Location (optional) - Helps find the closest stores & deals around you
Contacts (optional) - Used to identify the phone numbers you are recharging
Camera (optional) - Used for scanning QR codes

You can contact our customer support team at care@freecharge.com for any suggestions, queries, or comments.
For more updates, visit https://blog.freecharge.in
descriptionShort: Mobile Recharge & Bill Payment App, Pay Later, Personal Loan, Mutual Funds, UPI

• Find best-prepaid recharge plans & mobile recharge offers. You can make JIO Recharge, Airtel Recharge, Vi Recharge, and BSNL Recharge.
• Use the Freecharge app for FASTag recharge🚘 and travel worry-free.
•Avail exciting offers/rewards. Make Tata Sky recharge, Airtel DTH recharge, Videocon D2h recharge, Dish TV recharge, and Sun direct recharge📺.
•Buy Google Play recharge codes with exclusive cashback offers.

Payment app
•Avail amazing cashback🤑 offers on electricity bill payment, water bill payment, gas bill payment, postpaid bill payment, and broadband bill payment.
• Book LPG cylinder🏮 in minutes and enjoy exclusive offers/discounts.
• Freecharge also serves as a loan repayment app. We’ve made EMI payment super easy. Simply pay by phone from the comfort of your home in just a few clicks. •Save your salary💸 and pay rent with credit card or Buy Now Pay Later on Freecharge to earn reward points.

Buy Now Pay Later app We know, small expenses aren’t actually small. Boost your monthly budget with Freecharge Pay Later. Get instant credit up to ₹10,000/month💶, 30-day repayment period, and shop online/offline at 25,000+ stores🎁 with just a tap.

Instant Personal Loan app Get pre-approved instant personal loans📇 at best rates, disbursed by Axis Bank. It’s fully digital & requires no security.

Investments and Mutual funds app
•Choose top-rated mutual funds📊 (ratings by Value Research) from top AMCs like HDFC, Axis, ICICI, and more. Start investing in just 2 minutes with a min. amount of ₹500. 100% paperless process.
•Buy Digital Gold online🌟 at real-time market value & sell later to get high returns. It’s 24K, 99.9% pure.
• Start your Express FD investment💴 in just 3 minutes with min. Rs.5,000. It’s powered by Axis Bank and there is no penalty on premature withdrawal of Fixed deposits of up to 25%.

What Makes Freecharge Unique?
•Claim offers/deals available in the app and save every time you spend😎.
•Use the app regularly and get exclusive cashback codes via SMS🤗.
•All our financial services are backed with the trust of Axis Bank, so you can transact and invest worry-free on the Freecharge app🤘.

App Permissions and Reasons:
Phone - Used for enhancing the security of your account and for UPI registration
SMS (optional) - Helps us speed up your transaction by auto-filling OTP and provide personalized financial services
Location (optional) - Helps find the closest stores & deals around you
Contacts (optional) - Used to identify the phone numbers you are recharging
Camera (optional) - Used for scanning QR codes.

You can contact our customer support team at care@freecharge.com for any suggestions, queries, or comments. For more updates, visit https://www.freecharge.in/

creator: Freecharge
descriptionHtml:
Being a well-known name in the world of payment apps, having over 27 million users across the country, Freecharge has subtly transformed to become one of the leading financial services and investment apps in India. From payments and investments to Buy Now Pay Later and credit card applications, Freecharge lets you do it all effortlessly.

Key app Features

• Create your ‘@freecharge’ BHIM UPI ID and scan any QR to pay quickly & securely at any store. Earn cashback on your transactions.
• Apply for Freecharge Pay Later and avail exclusive offers on shopping👜, bill payment📄, and recharge📱. Go cashless at 25,000+ online/offline stores.
• Invest in SIPs, Express FD, Mutual Funds📈, and Digital Gold.
• Apply for a Freecharge Plus Virtual Credit Card and enjoy unlimited cashback🤑 on your spends
• Pay electricity bill online, make insurance payment, buy amazing deals from top brands, and send Gift Cards to your loved ones.

Use the Freecharge app as:

Money Transfer app • Make easy payments at any time🕒, from anywhere, to anyone using Freecharge UPI.
• Send/receive money easily in/from your bank account💰.

Recharge app
• Find best-prepaid recharge plans & mobile recharge offers. You can make JIO Recharge, Airtel Recharge, Vi Recharge, and BSNL Recharge.
• Use the Freecharge app for FASTag recharge🚘 and travel worry-free.
•Avail exciting offers/rewards. Make Tata Sky recharge, Airtel DTH recharge, Videocon D2h recharge, Dish TV recharge, and Sun direct recharge📺.
•Buy Google Play recharge codes with exclusive cashback offers.

Payment app
•Avail amazing cashback🤑 offers on electricity bill payment, water bill payment, gas bill payment, postpaid bill payment, and broadband bill payment.
• Book LPG cylinder🏮 in minutes and enjoy exclusive offers/discounts.
• Freecharge also serves as a loan repayment app. We’ve made EMI payment super easy. Simply pay by phone from the comfort of your home in just a few clicks. •Save your salary💸 and pay rent with credit card or Buy Now Pay Later on Freecharge to earn reward points.

Buy Now Pay Later app We know, small expenses aren’t actually small. Boost your monthly budget with Freecharge Pay Later. Get instant credit up to ₹10,000/month💶, 30-day repayment period, and shop online/offline at 25,000+ stores🎁 with just a tap.

Instant Personal Loan app Get pre-approved instant personal loans📇 at best rates, disbursed by Axis Bank. It’s fully digital & requires no security.

Investments and Mutual funds app
•Choose top-rated mutual funds📊 (ratings by Value Research) from top AMCs like HDFC, Axis, ICICI, and more. Start investing in just 2 minutes with a min. amount of ₹500. 100% paperless process.
•Buy Digital Gold online🌟 at real-time market value & sell later to get high returns. It’s 24K, 99.9% pure.
• Start your Express FD investment💴 in just 3 minutes with min. Rs.5,000. It’s powered by Axis Bank and there is no penalty on premature withdrawal of Fixed deposits of up to 25%.

What Makes Freecharge Unique?
•Claim offers/deals available in the app and save every time you spend😎.
•Use the app regularly and get exclusive cashback codes via SMS🤗.
•All our financial services are backed with the trust of Axis Bank, so you can transact and invest worry-free on the Freecharge app🤘.

App Permissions and Reasons:
Phone - Used for enhancing the security of your account and for UPI registration
SMS (optional) - Helps us speed up your transaction by auto-filling OTP and provide personalized financial services
Location (optional) - Helps find the closest stores & deals around you
Contacts (optional) - Used to identify the phone numbers you are recharging
Camera (optional) - Used for scanning QR codes.

You can contact our customer support team at care@freecharge.com for any suggestions, queries, or comments. For more updates, visit https://www.freecharge.in/

creator: Freecharge
descriptionHtml:
Being a well-known name in the world of payment apps, having over 27 million users across the country, Freecharge has become one of the leading financial services and investment apps in India. From recharge & bill payments to investment & lending, Freecharge lets you do it all effortlessly.

Key App Features

Sign up for Freecharge Pay Later and avail exclusive offers on top brands. Shop cashless at 40,000+ stores.
Create your ‘@freecharge’ BHIM UPI ID and send money to friends /family or scan any QR to pay quickly & securely at any store. Earn cashback on your transactions.
Avail Personal Loan, Credit card, and Pay Later
Get tips to improve your financial fitness with FIST (Financial Strength) score.
Set your short/long term financial goals with our ‘Goal Management System’ and invest in Mutual Funds📈, and Digital Gold to achieve them
Pay electricity bills online, do recharges, make insurance payment, buy amazing deals from top brands, and send Gift Cards to your loved ones.

Use Freecharge as:

Buy Now Pay Later App
Extend your monthly budget with Freecharge Pay Later. Get interest-free credit instantly for up to 30 days and shop online/offline at 40,000+ stores🎁 with just one tap.

Easy Credit App
• Get an Axis Bank personal loan of up to Rs.25 lakh💸 in as quick as 15 minutes at best in class rates
• Apply for Axis Bank Freecharge Plus Credit Card and enjoy unlimited cashback🤑 on your spends

UPI App
• Transfer money to your friends/family easily or scan any QR to pay at a local store.
• Enter the mobile number and find linked UPI IDs instantly.
• Send/receive money easily in/from your bank account. 💰

Recharge & Payments App
• Find best-prepaid recharge plans & mobile recharge offers on JIO Recharge, Airtel Recharge, Vi Recharge, and BSNL Recharge.
• Use the Freecharge app for FASTag recharge🚘 and travel worry-free.
• Avail exciting offers/rewards on Tata Sky, Airtel DTH, Videocon D2h, Dish TV, and Sun direct recharges📺.
•Avail amazing cashback🤑 offers on electricity, water, gas, postpaid, and broadband bill payments.
• Book LPG cylinder🏮 in minutes and enjoy exclusive offers/discounts.
• Save your salary💸 and pay rent with a credit card or Buy Now Pay Later on Freecharge to earn reward points.

Financial Fitness App
• Get complete clarity of your financial status and tips to improve your financial health with ​FIST (Financial Strength) score.

Goal Management App
• Your goals are as unique as you.😎 Set your financial goals using our ‘Goal Management System’ and we’ll help you with how you can achieve them.✌

Investments and Mutual funds App
• Choose top-rated mutual funds📊 (ratings by Value Research) from top fund houses like HDFC, Axis, ICICI, and more. Start investing in just 2 minutes from as low as Rs.100. 100% paperless process.
• Buy/sell Digital Gold online🌟 at real-time market value. It’s 24K, 99.9% pure.

Easy Credit App

UPI App
• Transfer money to your friends/family easily or scan any QR to pay at a local store.

Recharge & Payments App
• Find best-prepaid recharge plans & mobile recharge offers on JIO Recharge, Airtel Recharge, VI Recharge, and BSNL Recharge.

Being a well-known name in the world of payment apps, having over 100 million users across the country, Freecharge has transformed to become one of the leading financial services and investment apps in India. From recharge & bill payments to investment & lending, Freecharge lets you do it all effortlessly.

Key App Features

Create your ‘@freecharge’ BHIM UPI ID and send money to friends/family or scan any QR to pay quickly & securely at any store. Earn cash back on your transactions.
Get Credit card, Invest in Digital Gold
Pay electricity bills online, Do recharges, Make insurance payments, Buy amazing deals from top brands, and many more

Easy Credit App
• Apply for Axis Bank Freecharge Plus Credit Card and enjoy unlimited cashback🤑

UPI App
• Transfer money to your friends/family easily or scan any QR to pay at a local store.
• Send/receive money easily in/from your bank account.

Recharge & Payments App
• Find best-prepaid recharge plans & mobile recharge offers on JIO Recharge, Airtel Recharge, VI Recharge, and BSNL Recharge.
• Use the Freecharge app for FASTag recharge🚘 and travel worry-free.
• Avail exciting offers/rewards on Tata Play recharge, Airtel DTH recharge, Videocon D2H recharge, Dish TV recharge, and Sun direct recharge📺.
•Avail amazing cashback offers on electricity bill payment, water bill payment, gas bill payment, postpaid bill payment, and broadband bill payment.
• Book LPG cylinder🏮in minutes and enjoy exclusive offers/discounts.
• Save your salary 💸 and pay rent and education fee via credit card.

• Buy/sell Digital Gold online🌟 at real-time market value. It’s 24K, 99.9% pure.

What Makes Freecharge Unique?
•Claim offers/deals available only in the app and save every time you spend😎.
•All our financial services are secure and backed with the trust of Axis Bank, so you can transact and invest worry-free on the Freecharge app🤘.

Contact us at care@freecharge.com.

descriptionHtml:
Being a well-known name in the world of payment apps, having over 100 million users across the country, Freecharge has transformed to become one of the leading financial services and investment apps in India. From recharge & bill payments to investment & lending, Freecharge lets you do it all effortlessly.

Key App Features

Create your ‘@freecharge’ BHIM UPI ID and send money to friends/family or scan any QR to pay quickly & securely at any store. Earn cash back on your transactions.
Get Credit card, Invest in Digital Gold
Pay electricity bills online, Do recharges, Make insurance payments, Buy amazing deals from top brands, and many more

Easy Credit App
• Apply for Axis Bank Freecharge Plus Credit Card and enjoy unlimited cashback🤑

UPI App
• Transfer money to your friends/family easily or scan any QR to pay at a local store.
• Send/receive money easily in/from your bank account.

Recharge & Payments App
• Find best-prepaid recharge plans & mobile recharge offers on JIO Recharge, Airtel Recharge, VI Recharge, and BSNL Recharge.
• Use the Freecharge app for FASTag recharge🚘 and travel worry-free.
• Avail exciting offers/rewards on Tata Play recharge, Airtel DTH recharge, Videocon D2H recharge, Dish TV recharge, and Sun direct recharge📺.
•Avail amazing cashback offers on electricity bill payment, water bill payment, gas bill payment, postpaid bill payment, and broadband bill payment.
• Book LPG cylinder🏮in minutes and enjoy exclusive offers/discounts.
• Save your salary 💸 and pay rent and education fee via credit card.

• Buy/sell Digital Gold online🌟 at real-time market value. It’s 24K, 99.9% pure.

What Makes Freecharge Unique?
•Claim offers/deals available only in the app and save every time you spend😎.
•All our financial services are secure and backed with the trust of Axis Bank, so you can transact and invest worry-free on the Freecharge app🤘.

Contact us at care@freecharge.com.

creator: Freecharge - An Axis Bank Subsidiary
descriptionHtml:
Freecharge: One App for All Your Financial and Payment Needs
Trusted by Millions: Freecharge, powered by Axis Bank, serves over 50 million users across India. Effortlessly manage UPI payments, recharges, and bill payments, while exploring financial offerings such as credit scores, gold loans, and digital FDs—all in one seamless app.

Key Features:

UPI Lite: Experience faster, hassle-free transactions without entering your UPI PIN.
Secure Transactions: Protect your data with 128-bit encryption technology for safe and secure transactions.
UPI Payments: Link multiple bank accounts, manage payments, and access a convenient credit line.
Bill Payments & Recharges: Handle bill payments, mobile recharges, and subscriptions effortlessly in one app.
Gift Cards: Choose from a variety of gift cards redeemable both online and in-store.
Cashback Offers: Unlock exclusive cashback deals on recharges, bill payments, and shopping.
Gold Loan: Get quick and secure gold loans online at competitive rates, powered by Axis Bank.
Mobile Recharge Reminders: Stay on top of your recharges with timely notifications for upcoming due dates.

Effortless UPI Payments:

UPI Lite: Make quick payments up to ₹500 without entering your PIN for a faster, hassle-free experience.
Freecharge UPI ID: Set up your UPI ID to transfer money swiftly and securely.
Rupay Credit Card: Link your Rupay credit card for seamless UPI transactions and added convenience.
Auto Mandate: Automate recurring bill payments to ensure they’re always on time.
Bank Account Management: Manage multiple bank accounts, including Axis, SBI, HDFC, ICICI, and over 130 others, all from one app.

Recharge and Bill Payments:

Mobile Recharges: Quickly recharge for JIO, Airtel, VI, BSNL, and more with top offers and reminders for upcoming recharges.
Bill Payments: Pay electricity bills for providers like Tata Power, BSES, DHBVN, UNBVN, and 70+ others. Manage water, gas, postpaid mobile, and broadband bills effortlessly with exciting cashback offers.
Credit Card Payments: Simplify credit card bill payments, manage multiple cards, avoid late fees, and ensure timely payments in one place.
FASTag Services: Recharge your FASTag to skip toll queues or purchase one directly from the app for hassle-free travel.
Subscription Management: Renew OTT subscriptions like SonyLIV, Z5, and Wynk Music conveniently through the app.

Exciting Cashback and Offers:

Unlock exclusive cashback on bills, shopping, and recharges, making every transaction more rewarding.

Gift Cards for Every Occasion:

Wide Selection: Explore diverse gift cards for birthdays, anniversaries, festivals, and more.
Flexible Redemption: Redeem gift cards online or in-store at leading retailers for added convenience.
Exclusive Cashback: Enjoy great cashback offers on gift card purchases.

Financial Services by Freecharge:

Credit Score Insights: Check your credit score and access detailed reports to make informed financial decisions.
Axis Bank Fixed Deposits: Open a Digital Fixed Deposit in minutes, choose your tenure, and enjoy assured returns to grow your savings.
Gold Loans: Apply online for quick and secure gold loans with competitive rates and fast disbursement to your account.

Contact Us:

Email: care@freecharge.com | grievanceofficer@freecharge.com
Registered Office: 11th Floor, Tower C, DLF Cyber Greens, DLF Cyber City, DLF Phase 3, Gurugram, Haryana 122022, India
Contact Number: 0124 663 4800
descriptionShort: Axis Powered: UPI Lite, Recharge, Gold Loan, Gift Card, Electricity Bill Payment

appDetails.developerAddress:
Freecharge Payment Technologies Pvt Ltd
11th Floor, Tower C, DLF Cyber Greens, DLF Cyber City, DLF Phase 3, Gurugram, Haryana 122022
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
UPI Lite for Faster Payments: Seamless, PIN-free transactions for quicker payments.

Credit Line on UPI: Link your credit line and make merchant payments anytime, anywhere.

UPI PIN Setting via Aadhaar OTP: Alternate method to set your UPI PIN using Aadhaar OTP verification.

Mobile Recharge Reminders: Stay on top of your recharges with timely reminders and easy options.

General Improvements: Bug fixes, performance boosts, and a refined UI for a smoother experience.
